document_data.name: Rhys Ravenwind
document_data.mainbody: '''Rhys Ravenwind''' was a renowned [[bard]] and member of the [[Harpers]].
document_data.Personality: Despite being a bard, Rhys was quite shy.
document_data.Relationships: Rhys was friends with both [[Danilo Thann]] and [[Arilyn Moonblade]].
document_data.History: Rhys was killed in [[Waterdeep]] by the [[Harper Assassin]] in [[1361 DR]].
